page.title: 02A typical day in my life
page.content: After I get up about 7.30 and dress,I go down for my breakfast.My first chore of the day is to take some milk out to the lambs and feed the sheep while my brother feeds the dogs. My father prepares for his work on the Badcall fish-farm. My mother is busy preparing breakfast for the guests. At 9.00 we leave for school. After a busy day in school we do our home work which takes about fifteen minutes. We are allowed to play with our computer till 5.00, when we have our tea.If the weather is good we play outside while my mother makes dinner for the guests. At half past eight we are put into the bathroom and have to emerge well scrubbed. I go to bed at 9.00 and read till 9.30 Another day in my life is over.
